Articles.Content:
It was in .25. I was trying to revive Jeb via Text edit when I came across a part called:

POTATO LIKE ROCK

Desc was:

Big ol rock like thing

I switched it from not being able to be found to being found

And I played with it.

The model is not true in the VAB/SPH. Attach anything and then when you launch. BOOM. I'll try to find it in 1.0 and hopefully get a screen shot.
It's the asteriod part and it's been around since they were added IIRC.

This is what happens when you

1. Attach about 50 potato-like-asteroids together. (With The heavy struts from KW Rocketry)(No, it doesn't lag, even with Intel HD Graphics 3000).

2. Watch them crash to the ground, destroy a few parts of the Kerbal Space Center.

3. Revert Launch.

3. Put the asteroid(s?) in synchronous orbit around Gilly.(With HyperEdit).

4. Move another one to Gilly. (Another Giant Asteroid Thing)

5. Make them rendevous. (With Hyperedit)(Really, you expect me to guide thing to Gilly with Rockets?)

6. Watch the impact

7. See the spectacular Asteroid Belt that is created.

https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=E6C883C76ED2870E!3425&authkey=!AOlUKFGXFSbjZyo&ithint=folder%2cpng
